short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will eliminate harmful manosphere content.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will help filter harmful manosphere content when surfing the web. It only works with text sources for the time-being, not videos, but is able to filter most harmful content when keywords or phrases are found in an article or similar text. This is ideal for parents to install on their children's devices - particularly teenage boys - as many adolescents are exposed to harmful manosphere content, which can lead to negative views about women, sex, etc.
